title: Sated and Essense Reaver
body: Does anyone know about how the Phantom Hit interacts with Reaver's passive?

replies.body:
That's not a proper on hit, read the passive.

>Restore 2% to 8% of the damage dealt by basic attacks as mana

It's based on the damage your basic attack deals not how often it hits.
It restores based on how much % mana you are missing...
It works normally. The passive on Essence Reaver is considered a on-hit effect. I wouldn't recommend building it with Sated though.
